text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... It's friggin' hot...

text_block_list.name: Spirited Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hraaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Fiery Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hah! Yah! Hyah! Hiyaaah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna run one more before I lose<n>momentum.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah. It's just one more.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: All the runners are charged up for thebiggest part of summer camp. EvenTaishin is getting really into it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's starting to worry me. I wish<n>there was some way to
make her<n>take a break and ease the tension...

text_block_list.name: Fiery Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
YES! We did all the drills! I'm going to<n>get ready for the
festival like we<n>promised!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yeah, the festival. Then let's meet<n>up right before the
fireworks start at<n>seven.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I had no idea, though something tells<n>me Taishin wouldn't
enjoy the<n>crowds.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But still, it feels like a waste to sit it<n>out. Think... Something
fun, but<n>relaxing...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Glug. Ahhh...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Where'd everybody go? Oh right,<n>there's a festival or
something today.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: No one's here. Perfect. Now I can<n>push it to the limit.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Like what?
choice_data_list: Want to head closer to the forest?
Want to head closer to the forest?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hmmm... The forest, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I mean, sure, I guess. Nobody's there<n>either.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: On the way over, the sun sets to<n>reveal a star-filled night...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Where the heck are we going? We're<n>already pretty far out.
choice_data_list: Here should be fine. Just wait a second.
Here should be fine. Just wait a second.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wait for what?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The fireworks begin at seven o'clock.<n>Which means they
should start in five,<n>four, three, two...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whistle... Bang!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Whoa...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
How'd you know that would<n>happen? Hey, did you plan
this?
choice_data_list: Me? No way. What a coincidence, huh?
Me? No way. What a coincidence, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I should've known youwere up to something.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Boom! Bang!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fireworks light up the sky one after<n>another and fill the night
with a<n>rainbow of colors.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For a minute, we listen to them<n>crackle with the breeze.
Then, Narita<n>Taishin softly begins to speak.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I can't stand them. Festivals, I mean.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Crowds of people all jammed<n>together. How could anyone
want to<n>be in a place like that? Not that I ever<n>tried.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You know, your know-it-all attitude<n>really gets on my
nerves.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
But the fireworks... They're not bad.<n>And no dumb jerks
blocking the view.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I feel less pressure when nobody's<n>around.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as she says, she looks<n>completely relaxed now. Being
away<n>from judgmental eyes is important to<n>her...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: But I hope she can make one<n>exception to that.
choice_data_list: I'm here though. Is that okay?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez, don't be so weird.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You're, you know... different.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You're like one of those fish.<n>Doesn't matter whether
you're<n>around or not.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
But how about you, fishies? I wonder<n>if they notice me...
Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Whatever, it doesn't matter. They<n>aren't really watching.
They're just<n>around.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It's fine... I like it that way—makes it<n>easier for me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You can hang around if you want.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So apparently, I'm on the level of a<n>fish. But from her,
that's the best<n>thing there—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey, quit it. You're staring like an<n>idiot.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Darn right, you dummy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite Taishin's rude words, the<n>light from the bursting
fireworks<n>illuminates her decidedly gentle smile.
